QTF is the same as WTF, it has by far always meant that, until you prove me wrong, stfu. Repeating ‘Fail’ only makes you fail, damn rejects.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/QFT
EPIC FAIL

You sir, are a fucken retard.[/quote]
FAIL
